field.name: resourcetype
field.comment: Type. Either cat, art or other.

field.name: specifictype
field.comment: Holds the type identifier, if other is set on type.

field.name: identifier
field.comment: ID of the resource. I.e. idart or idcat.

field.name: removeable
field.comment: Indicates whether or not the entity might be deleted.

field.name: uuid
field.comment: The users UUID. Might be used instead of login.

field.name: password
field.comment: Hashed password. Use MD5 to reset the value.

field.name: idlang
field.comment: The pre-selected client/language in the backend.

field.name: acfrom
field.comment: First moment the user has access. Or null.

field.name: acuntil
field.comment: Last moment the user has access. Or null.

field.name: textvalue
field.comment: Holds a text representation of the value.

field.name: floatvalue
field.comment: Null, if type is not a number.

field.name: datevalue
field.comment: Null, if type is not a date.

field.name: url
field.comment: Full URL of the article with the specified idartlang.

field.name: idartlang
field.comment: The page the entity belongs to.

field.name: manualentry
field.comment: 1 indicates a manual entry made with the plugin.

field.name: index
field.comment: Index to identify the content within the page context.

field.name: title
field.comment: Name of the article. Seen only in the backend.

field.name: urlname
field.comment: Identifier used in the URL building process.

field.name: pagetitle
field.comment: Title to be used as title tag in the HTML.

field.name: teasertitle
field.comment: Title to be used in teasers.

field.name: summary
field.comment: Summary or description of the page's content.

field.name: created
field.comment: Time, the page has been created.

field.name: online
field.comment: Indicates whether or not the page is visible.

field.name: published
field.comment: Indicates whether or not the page is published.

field.name: redirect
field.comment: Indicates whether or not the page is a redirector.

field.name: artsort
field.comment: Value used to sort in aggregations.

field.name: locked
field.comment: Not used. Will be removed in the future.

field.name: configsetid
field.comment: Config set assigned to the article.

field.name: preid
field.comment: Unused. Will be removed in the future.

field.name: postid
field.comment: Unused. Will be removed in the future.

field.name: lft
field.comment: Left value of the nested set.

field.name: rgt
field.comment: Right value of the nested set.

field.name: author
field.comment: Unused. Will be removed in the future.

field.name: visible
field.comment: Visibility of the category in the navigation.

field.name: public
field.comment: 1 indicates that the category is publicly available.

field.name: author
field.comment: Unused. Will be removed in the future.

field.name: startidartlang
field.comment: The page that is used as the index page.

field.name: urlname
field.comment: Category name used in the URL building process.

field.name: configsetid
field.comment: The config set assigned to the category.

field.name: claim
field.comment: Claim to use in modern Navigations.

field.name: config
field.comment: Unused. Will be removed in the future.

field.name: name
field.comment: Name of the author of the comment.

field.name: deleted
field.comment: If a value is set, the comment is assumed to be deleted.

field.name: countryid
field.comment: The country, the city belongs to.

field.name: active
field.comment: Indicates whether or not the language is active.

field.name: encoding
field.comment: Encoding used in this particular language.

field.name: xtl
field.comment: X coordinate of top left corner of the area of interest.

field.name: ytl
field.comment: Y coordinate of the top left corner of the area of interest.

field.name: xbr
field.comment: X coordinate of the bottom right corner of the AOI.

field.name: ybr
field.comment: Y coordinate of the bottom right corner of the AOI.

field.name: uploaded
field.comment: Time the upload has been made.

field.name: deleted
field.comment: If not null, the file is assumed to be deleted.

field.name: val
field.comment: Value assigned to the tag. Usually NULL.
